[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@primitivefi/rmm-sdk](./rmm-sdk.md) &gt; [IPool](./rmm-sdk.ipool.md)

## IPool interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Abstraction of a Primitive RMM Pool

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IPool 
```

## Remarks

State includes reserves and calibration, just as a pool in PrimitiveEngine.sol does.

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [expired](./rmm-sdk.ipool.expired.md) | boolean | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> True if Date.now() in seconds is greater than <code>maturity</code> timestamp. |
|  [inTheMoney](./rmm-sdk.ipool.inthemoney.md) | boolean | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> True if <code>strike</code> is below <code>referencePriceOfRisky</code>. |
|  [invariant](./rmm-sdk.ipool.invariant.md) | FixedPointX64 | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Trading function invariant of the Pool, formatted as Q64.64 |
|  [lastTimestamp](./rmm-sdk.ipool.lasttimestamp.md) | Time | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Timestamp of last curve update. |
|  [liquidity](./rmm-sdk.ipool.liquidity.md) | Wei | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Total liquidity of Pool, including the min liquidity [IEngine.MIN\_LIQUIDITY](./rmm-sdk.iengine.min_liquidity.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [premium](./rmm-sdk.ipool.premium.md) | number | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Theoretical call option premium, computed using the pool's calibration data. |
|  [referencePriceOfRisky](./rmm-sdk.ipool.referencepriceofrisky.md) | Wei | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Gets stored reference price of [IEngine.risky](./rmm-sdk.iengine.risky.md)<!-- -->, denominated in [IEngine.stable](./rmm-sdk.iengine.stable.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [remaining](./rmm-sdk.ipool.remaining.md) | Time | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Difference between <code>maturity</code> timestamp and the current timestamp returned by Date.now(). |
|  [reportedPriceOfRisky](./rmm-sdk.ipool.reportedpriceofrisky.md) | Wei | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Gets the reported price CFMM for the [IEngine.risky](./rmm-sdk.iengine.risky.md) token, denominated in the [IEngine.stable](./rmm-sdk.iengine.stable.md) token. |
|  [reserveRisky](./rmm-sdk.ipool.reserverisky.md) | Wei | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Risky token reserves of [IEngine.risky](./rmm-sdk.iengine.risky.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [reserveStable](./rmm-sdk.ipool.reservestable.md) | Wei | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Stable token reserves of [IEngine.stable](./rmm-sdk.iengine.stable.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [tau](./rmm-sdk.ipool.tau.md) | number | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Difference between <code>maturity</code> timestamp and <code>lastTimestamp</code>. |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getCurrentLiquidityValue(priceOfRisky, priceOfStable)](./rmm-sdk.ipool.getcurrentliquidityvalue.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Gets the current value of the pool denominated in units of <code>priceOfRisky</code>. |
|  [liquidityQuote(amount, sideOfPool)](./rmm-sdk.ipool.liquidityquote.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Computes other side(s) of pool and/or liquidity amount, given a known size of one side of the pool. |
